plugin.name: coffeescript-compiler
plugin.author: Brian Kotek
plugin.title: Coffeescript Compiler Plugin
plugin.description: A simple CoffeeScript 1.4 compiler plugin. It compiles .coffee source files into .js files, and does not require NodeJS or CoffeeScript to be installed on your machine. Leaves you with full control over if/how to use these generated .js files as resources, etc. Full documentation at: https://github.com/brian428/grails-coffeescript-compiler-plugin.
